name: Bruker
description: Bruker, a leading company in scientific instruments and analytical solutions, is seeking a System Engineer with at least 2 years of experience and a degree in Engineering or Physical Sciences to design, analyse, and resolve system design weaknesses for their X-ray products in their Semiconductor Division; the position involves contributing to the frame works of multiple products or systems, leading new product developments, supporting integration processes of tools and transferring knowledge and systems to production.
